text: PASOK, the Panhellenic socialist movement, is a social democratic political party in Greece. PASOK stands for Panellinio Sosialistiko Kinima (). It was started by Andreas Papandreou in 1974. Until 2015, it was one of two major political parties, the other was its main political rival, New Democracy (Greece). In 2019, it joined forces with other similar parties, and formed Kinima Allagis. Category:20th-century establishments in Greece Category:1974 establishments in Europe Category:Political parties in Greece
title: PASOK
